most_recent.text: Love this moisturizer! Gentle on my sensitive skin. Moisturizes nicely, not too heavy on oily skin. Nice mix of chemical and physical sunscreens. No problems with it.
most_recent.title: Cerave Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen

most_recent.text: It leaves a white cast and it made my eyes burn. It also made the rest of my face burn in certain places.
most_recent.title: Not great

most_recent.text: Usually I am a fan of cerave but unfortunately I am not a fan of this product. Just like other reviews have already mentioned it leaves white pieces of the product on your face when you rub it in. I’ll just stick with cetaphil daily facial moisturizer since it never had this issue.
most_recent.title: Really wanted to like it...

most_recent.text: Peels when trying to apply don’t have good experience using this with makeup as it would just slide off
most_recent.title: Decent

most_recent.text: Works great, I put my daily moisturizer on afterwards. My face is always sunburnt going out in the sun but this prevents that.
most_recent.title: Great facial suncreen

most_recent.text: Pills terribly when paired with anything else.
most_recent.title: Pilling!

most_recent.text: This is one of the moisturizers that did not help my skin. No matter how many times I tried, it just would not absorb into my skin. It would get clumpy and have this sticky texture all over my face. It bummed me out because this moisturizer had good reviews and also it is an spf. But it’s just not for me. Just be careful with this.
most_recent.title: Just don’t know

most_recent.text: I love CeraVe products, but I’ve never vibed with this AM cream moisturizer. It doesn’t irritate my skin but never leaves me feeling hydrated. I much prefer the CeraVe PM cream sister product, which I use in the morning as my day cream.
most_recent.title: Not my favorite

bullet_descriptions: Health Facts: Contains Ceramides, Oil-Free, Contains Hyaluronic Acid, No Fragrance Added, Noncomedogenic
Beauty Purpose: Sun Protection, Exfoliating, Anti-Acne, Moisturizing
Recommended Skin Type: Combination, Acne-Prone, Oily, Extra Sensitive, Normal, Sensitive, Dry
Features: Dermatologist Tested, Dermatologist Recommended, Moisturizing, Lightweight
product_description.downstream_description:
CeraVe AM Face Moisturizer SPF 30 is an oil-free daily face lotion with spf and hyaluronic acid that offers UV protection and ceramides help restore the skin's barrier. This CeraVe face moisturizer with sunscreen is a hydrating facial lotion that spreads easily, is absorbed quickly, and leaves a non-greasy finish. Non-comedogenic face sunscreen won't clog pores, so is suitable for all skin types. This CeraVe sunscreen moisturizer features three essential ceramides, hydrating hyaluronic acid and soothing niacinamide, plus patented MVE Delivery Technology to supply much-needed moisture throughout the day. Sunscreen for face is allergy tested, oil-free, fragrance-free, and developed with dermatologists.

Key Ingredients:
InVisibleZinc™ Technology features micro-fine zinc oxide for SPF 30 broad-spectrum sunscreen protection
Ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
Hyaluronic acid helps the skin retain moisture
Niacinamide helps calm the skin
MVE Technology, a patented delivery system, continually releases moisturizing ingredients

How to Use:
Use this daily face sunscreen as the last step in a morning skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply CeraVe AM facial lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed
Unlock the pump for first time use by twisting it to the left and pressing down several times until the product comes out. Note: You may actually have to press down on the pump as many as 10-20 times to initially begin dispensing lotion.
Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure
Reapply at least every 2 hours
Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating
Children under 6 months of age, ask a doctor
Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including:
Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m.-2 p.m.
Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses

Brand Story:
CeraVe is the #1 dermatologist recommended skincare brand*. Whether you need products for your sensitive, oily, acne-prone, combination or normal skin, need a soothing moisturizer for your baby, have specific skin concerns, like eczema or psoriasis, or just want a hydrating serum or anti-aging cream, CeraVe can help. The CeraVe story began in 2005 after experts noticed that many skin conditions such as acne, eczema, psoriasis and dry skin all had one thing in common: a compromised skin barrier. Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe offers a complete line of skincare products that contain three essential ceramides enhanced with a revolutionary delivery system to help restore the skin’s natural protective barrier.

*Source: IQVIA, ProSource Survey, Q1-Q4 2020
product_description.soft_bullet_description:
•CeraVe oil-free, daily face moisturizer with sunscreen for normal to dry skin ​
•Ultra-fine zinc oxide moisturizer provides broad-spectrum SPF 30 UVA/UVB protection​
•Non-comedogenic face sunscreen without fragrance absorbs quickly and leaves a non-greasy finish ​
•Hyaluronic acid to retain the skin’s natural moisture​
•Ceramides to restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier​
•Niacinamide to calm the skin​
•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration ​
•CeraVe face lotion with spf is developed with dermatologists and recommended for daily use by the Skin Cancer Foundation

finds_posts.caption: Cera Ve facial moisturizing lotion great for dry skin.

How is #tiktokmademebuyit not bigger?!

But really, awhile back I was running low on retinol & saw bauerbeautyco recommended the cerave Resurfacing Retinol Serum, so I decided to try it out! 
The goods ✨
•ceramides, encapsulated retinol, licorice root extract, niacinamide
Helps to reduce the appearance of post acne marks & pores, while repairing the skin’s barrier.
I haven’t noticed a huge difference in acne marks with this, but I like it because it doesn’t dry my skin out like some retinols do.

I also purchased the cerave AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with SPF 30.
The goods✨
•ceramides, hyaluronic acid, niacinamide 
•Non-comedogenic formula SPF 30
I was looking for a basic daily moisturizer with SPF, and this is it! It does leave a bit of a white cast at first, but blends in nicely. I don’t love sunscreens with a strong smell, but this one isn’t too overpowering whatsoever.

Who else loves a good drugstore find? 😍 
Leave your drugstore skincare recommendations below!

No surprise here, I’ve managed to fall in LOVE with yet another Cerave product!!👏🏼💗I use this every night after washing my face! I love the lightweight feel especially when going to bed, It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and refreshed! This one is definitely worth checking out!🤩 Unfortunately this is not sponsored(I wish it was!!) I just genuinely love their products!! #target #targetfinds #targetgirlfinds #bargain #deals #coupons #mytargetstyle #targetstyle #sharemytargetstyle #targetlife #targetdeals 
#targetrun #targetlove #targetaddict #targetdoesitagain #cerave #ceraveskincare #targetbeauty

general_directions: Directions For sunscreen use: • apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure • reapply at least every 2 hours • use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating • Sun Protection Measures. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: • limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m.- 2 p.m. • wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses • children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor
direction.label: Directions

inactive_ingredients: water, niacinamide, glycerin, cetearyl alcohol, behentrimonium methosulfate, dimethicone, BHT, ceramide NP, ceramide AP, ceramide EOP, carbomer, triethoxycaprylylsilane, methylparaben, sodium lauroyl lactylate, cholesterol, aluminum starch octenylsuccinate, disodium EDTA, propylparaben, hydroxyethylcellulose, hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, phytosphingosine, xanthan gum

bullets: Other information • protect the product in this container from excessive heat and direct sun
other_information.label: Other information

uses.label: Uses
treated_symptoms: Uses helps prevent sunburn if used as directed with other sun protection measures (see Directions), decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun
